option.blocketleagueutils.camerasmooth.t: How smooth the camera move to the ball position (0 = slow & smooth, 1 = fast & rigid)
option.blocketleagueutils.showhud.name: Show HUD on Ball Cam
option.blocketleagueutils.showhud.toolti: A simple HUD that shows when Ball Cam is active
option.blocketleagueutils.disablethirdpe: Disables the third person front view (double F5) that serves no purpose in Blocket League
